# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```js
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

```js
var p = path.posix.join( 'foo', 'bar' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

</section>

<!-- /.notes -->

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```js
var x = 3.14;
```

</section>
